amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 508. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transform the National Energy Technology Laboratory into a government-owned, contractor-operated laboratory, or to consolidate or close the National Energy Technology Laboratory.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transform the National energy Technology Laboratory into a government-owned, contractor-operated laboratory, or to consolidate or close the National Energy Technology Laboratory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. McKinley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
